attributes.action: Regulate all state money given to persons suffering from clinical addictions so there wealth is spent wisely.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people suffering form sever clinical addictions such as to drugs and alcohol are given, rightly, state money and benefits to keep them above the breadline. However many use this money to fuel there addiction and this means the governments & taxpayers money unknowingly fuels not only there misery, but crime and the drug dealers piggy bank. 

It is with this concern that if on the opinion of a medical agency or social worker that this money is being spent to fuel there addiction that the state regulate there money and makes sure it is spent on cloths,  foods and other good with some luxuries if able. So as to better the addicted persons life and to spend there money wisely as deep down most people with addictions want to but cant find the strength to.
